amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 118-298 to prohibit institutions that commit three violations under this Act from obtaining a waiver or a renewal of a waiver.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
